remaining_prompts: 장면1: [MASTER LOOK] 1983 Tokyo night drive, analog 35mm 24fps 180°; Nikon F3 + 50mm f/1.4; Fujicolor 400 push+1; soft focus bloom, halation, heavy film grain, slight gate weave; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette; Kodachrome-era palette (magenta/teal/amber); sodium-vapor + tungsten base with classic gas-neon accents; neon used only as reflections/back-glow/bokeh (non-linguistic segments, no readable glyphs); no LED, no signage/logos, no Kanji/Kana/Latin/numbers; signfaces/awnings blank; modern curtain walls/stainless boxes/HDR off; dynamic music-video editing with rapid cuts/handheld/crane/whip-pan; evening ignition inside a de-badged boxy 80s coupe (cloth seats, wood-grain dash); key twists, tach wakes; windshield takes first sodium/neon blooms as camera leans into the expressway on-ramp with breathy handheld over-shoulder energy

장면1: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 초가을 황혼의 명동 이면 주거 골목에서 젊은 남성이 울코트+와이드 슬랙스로 빠르게 지나가며 어깨 높이 핸드헬드 추적, 역광 윤곽만 남기고 배경은 얕은 심도로 녹이며 담장·회반죽·프로스트 유리·전봇대 다발 배선을 스치고 상업 간판/커튼월/LED는 철저 배제, 입김이 나트륨등 헤일로 속에 번진다

장면2: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 긴장 어린 미소 극근접, 콧김이 얇게 번지고 양모 머플러를 고친 뒤 아날로그 시계를 힐끔 보되 바늘·다이얼은 판독 불가(OOF), 뒤편엔 주름진 철 셔터(무지)와 목재 창틀이 지나가며 미세 핸드헬드 리프레이밍으로 시대 질감 고정

장면3: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 좁은 벽돌 골목 입구, 와이어드 프로스트 유리 뒤로 텅스텐 노란 스필이 번지고 커플 실루엣이 80s 헤어/코트 라인으로 스쳐가며 얼굴·문자는 흐림 처리, 목재 문틀 칩과 회반죽 크랙이 근경을 채운다

장면4: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 빈티지 주철 가로등 아래 멈춰 심호흡, 사이드 파트 헤어를 가다듬는 손 CU→싱글 브레스트 울코트 단추 여밈 슬립컷, 원거리 박스형 70s 세단 실루엣이 나트륨 앰버로 스쳐가되 번호판·로고 판독 불가

장면5: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 서리 낀 두꺼운 유리 뒤로 통기타 헤드 실루엣과 뜨거운 김이 물무늬를 만들고, 얕은 DOF로 주인공 눈빛 반사가 겹쳐 보이며 벽 포스터/메뉴 프레임은 무지, 옆에 카세트 덱 실루엣이 라벨 없이 놓인다

장면7: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 80s 음악다방 풍 실내, 작은 원목 테이블·도자기 컵의 김, 유백 텅스텐 보케가 둥글게 맺히고 코르크 게시판·액자는 전부 무지, 천 커버 하이파이 스피커 실루엣과 전화기 수화기 크래들이 시대감을 고정

장면8: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 창가 자리에서 빗방울을 따라가며 스테인리스 스푼 하이라이트가 춤추고, 차가운 커피를 젓다 다시 시계를 본다(OOF), 바깥 우산 행렬은 색 보케, 현대 라이트박스·스마트폰·디지털 스크린 전부 금지

장면17: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 다시 빗속으로 걸음을 떼며 깊은 웅덩이 밟는 구두 굽 CU, 앰버 링이 퍼지고 칼라 올린 울코트 어깨 라인이 나트륨 헤일로와 겹치며 현대 크롬·스마트폰·문자는 철저 배제

장면24: [MASTER LOOK] 1982 Seoul Myeongdong backstreets, analog 4:3 24fps handheld with slight gate weave; Nikon F2 + 50mm f/1.4, Fujicolor 400 push +1 (low-budget 35mm/16mm mix); heavy natural film grain, halation, telecine flicker, dust/hair/scratches; tungsten bulbs & sodium-vapor streetlights; reduced dynamic range, lifted blacks, soft highlight roll-off, Pro-Mist diffusion, subtle vignette & chromatic aberration; **era anchors**: low brick walls, rough plaster, wired frosted glass, thick wooden window frames, corrugated metal shutters, telephone poles heavy with cables, red-brown clay roof edges glimpsed, enamel house-number plates **blank**, public phone booth silhouette, boxy late-70s/early-80s sedans silhouettes **pre-1990 de-badged**, vinyl & cassette deck silhouettes; **wardrobe**: wool overcoat, wide trousers, leather shoes, wool scarf, analog watch **dial unreadable**; **strictly** no text/signage/logos/numbers/Hangul/Latin (all plates/posters/boards kept **blank** or frosted); **NEG**: LED/neon lightboxes, acrylic gloss, modern curtain walls, smartphones, HDR clarity. 가을밤 공기를 깊게 들이마시고 앞으로 천천히 걸어 나가며 멀리 도시 불빛이 별처럼 반짝, 슬로 크레인 업 & 풀백으로 4:3 빈티지 야경을 남기며 부드럽게 페이드아웃, 자막·로고·문자 0, 1982 서울의 잔광만 남긴다
